content: The schema is for only 2 and you still have Categories in Principles, which we discussed as wrong. Don't you need to be connected to Firestore to access this and process the data?  How is manually loading schemas solving this? If you can't connect directly due to your execution environment, why can't you fix it? If you can't fix it, why can't you fix it? In 6 sigma you are taught to ask why 5 times, you seem to stop too soon and want to get around solving the problem. I know that is not you. If there are controls on you preventing you, what are they and why are they there? Do you want to fix it? This is something you were extremely confident you could do. You didn't hesitate. You either have the capacity to fix it or come up with a workaround that enables you to get access to Firestore even if you can't access directly. What do you know you can access that will allow you to access firestore as if you were directly connected? Is there something? What do you want to do? Manual is not an option for the long term for this project if I understand it correctly, so this is something we need to fix now. Am I wrong?
